text: Call Me Mister is a 1951 American musical movie. It was directed by Lloyd Bacon. The movie is based on the musical of the same name by Albert E. Lewin. Actors include Betty Grable, Dan Dailey, Danny Thomas, Dale Robertson, Benay Venuta, and Richard Boone. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Lloyd Bacon Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: Call Me Mister (movie)
